definitions.meaning: by the end of the year

sentences.simplifiedText: 我们年前要完成这个项目。
sentences.traditionalText: 我們年前要完成這個項目。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen niánqián yào wánchéng zhège xiàngmù.
sentences.translation: We need to complete this project by the end of the year.

sentences.simplifiedText: 老板已经明确指出，所有的报告必须在年前提交。
sentences.traditionalText: 老闆已經明確指出，所有的報告必須在年前提交。
sentences.pinyin: Lǎobǎn yǐjīng míngquè zhǐchū, suǒyǒu de bàogào bìxū zài niánqián tíjiǎo.
sentences.translation: The boss has made it clear that all reports must be submitted by the end of the year.
